roleset.name: put in
roleset.note: IMPLANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'implant' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Placing. (from implant.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: The controversy began in 1987 when [the National Institutes of Health, aware of the policy implications of its research,]-1 asked for an HHS review of its plan *trace*-1 to implant fetal tissue into the brain of a patient suffering from Parkinson's disease.
example.arg: into the brain of a patient suffering from Parkinson's disease

example.name: Arg0,1,2
example.text: According to Federer, the answer is his implantation of mental imagery into his training regimen.
